trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Data.EntityClient" /> namespace is the .NET Framework Data Provider for the Entity Framework.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.Data.EntityClient" /> 命名空间是用于 Entity Framework 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The `EntityClient` provider uses storage-specific [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/includes/vstecado-md.md)] Data Provider classes and mapping metadata for interacting with entity data models.
trans-unit.target: `EntityClient`提供程序使用特定于存储的[!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/includes/vstecado-md.md)]数据提供程序类和映射元数据与实体数据模型进行交互。

trans-unit.source: `EntityClient` translates operations performed on conceptual entities into operations performed on physical data sources.
trans-unit.target: `EntityClient` 将转换到的物理数据源执行的操作对概念性实体执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: It translates result sets returned from physical data sources into conceptual entities.
trans-unit.target: 然后再将物理数据源返回的结果集转换为概念性实体。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use this namespace in [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] applications, see [ADO.NET Entity Framework](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a437041f-6899-4ae7-96ce-aabf528d7205).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用此命名空间中的详细信息[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]应用程序，请参阅[ADO.NET 实体框架](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a437041f-6899-4ae7-96ce-aabf528d7205)。
